d0clmt6k1jj86MAJimlnig.text: They've jumped a to a stellar 5 stars... not because the food rose to another level as I really don't think it possible, being top of the Indian taste ladder as they are, but because...wait for it, I managed a joke with the guy behind the counter!!! Finally!   Wonders never cease and the Delta Indian Takeaway is No.1!!!

gp1-IPuSAYhFXsXnQr2ovQ.text: This place has PHENOMENAL Indian food. It's True to the culture and very authentic. Try it and you'll be blown away.

2OftJPG08UyJBgWqsN9TdA.text: This is easily the best Indian takeaway in Edinburgh! The food is absolutely delicious! They are very friendly and accomodating.   I was lucky enough to live two doors away when I first moved to Edinburgh and was spoilt! I've not found a takeaway yet that matches it - and believe me, living on the other side of town, I've tried! - but I'm working on it.   They deliver but only in the local area but I've still made the journey accross town just to collect! If that devotion isn't testimony to the standard of this takeaway I'm not sure what is!

eKZOGitRr9LEHD2uxz1Wfg.text: Great Takeaway. Friendly staff with a good range of tasty curries. Highly recommended

zeZMlp_MYr107oKnSR-kwg.text: I ordered from here on a recommendation, not knowing the last time the person ordered from here was a year ago. The food turned up luke warm and the curry was not the greatest. Perhaps the takeaway has had a changed of ownership. I was severely dissapointed and ended up dumping the majority of it in the bin, having ordered a curry, rice, pilau rice and pakoras. What a waste of money.
